short_summary: Wharf Repairs to structure 406 including deck replacement
description: The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for wharf repairs to structure 406 including deck replacement at Arisaig DFO-SCH, Antigonish County, Nova Scotia.",
full_summary:
# Wharf Repairs to Structure 406 Including Deck Replacement
==============================================

#### Tender Details

Reference Number: CB-6440-99685935
Amendment Number: 2
Solicitation Number: 30004511
Publication Date: 2023-06-14
Closes: 2023-06-30T13:00:00

#### Request for Proposal

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the wharf repairs to structure 406, including deck replacement, at Arisaig DFO-SCH, Antigonish County, Nova Scotia.

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-17
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-11-30
* Procurement Category: Construction Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tenders will be evaluated based on price.
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies.

#### Project Description
The contractor shall provide all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the wharf repairs, including deck replacement, to structure 406. The work must be completed by November 30, 2023.

#### Required Documents
To participate in this tender, contractors must access the following documents:

* SPECIFICATION IFT (PDF)
* DRAWINGS IFT (PDF)
* ADDENDUM 1 (PDF)
* INVITATION TO TENDER (PDF)

For more information, please visit our website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Karen Dolan
* Email: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: (782) 377-7245

Please direct any inquiries to the above contact information.

#### Regions

* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia
